antiiViiruzs is correct, and I came back here because I also want to warn you. It is true the files offered here do not contain a virus when scanned as is.
As antiiViiruzs said, IT IS DURING THE OS INSTALLATION that these .exe programs are installed randomly on System files. Try it yourself, install this OS and then install immediately a top AV program, or, if you have the know-how and dare, connect the drive to a computer that has AV and scan.
The AV will find and vault these .exe, but personally, I would rather install a clean system.
I am so surprised that no one else has come back to report this.
